text: Oscar Miguel Cacho Malbernat Candela (2 February 1944 – 9 August 2019) was an Argentine footballer and manager. He was the captain of Estudiantes de La Plata between 1967 and 1972. He played for Boca Juniors in 1972 and Racing Club de Avellaneda in 1973. From 1966 to 1970, Malbernat played for the national team. Malbernat was born in La Plata, Argentina. Malbernat died of kidney failure in La Plata on 9 August 2019 at the age of 75.Murió Cacho Malbernat, una gloria con el estilo de la mejor época de Estudiantes ==References== ==Other websites== *Oscar Malbernat at El Crack Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine football managers
title: Oscar Malbernat
